SELECT cci.ID, cci.ID_NUM, cci.IS_FIXED_PERIOD, cci.CONTRACT_PERIOD, cci.CONTRACT_PERIOD_DATE, cci.JOB_AGREEMENT, cci.JOB_AGREEMENT_DATE, cci.REMARK_RENEW, cci.REMARK, cci.FILE_NUM, cci.BAD_NUM, csi.STAFF_ID, csi.`NAME` FROM cy_contract_inside AS cci LEFT JOIN cy_staff_inside AS csi ON(csi.ID_NUM=cci.ID_NUM) WHERE 1=1
AND cci.ID_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{contractInside.idNum},'%')
AND cci.FILE_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{contractInside.fileNum},'%')
AND cci.BAD_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{contractInside.badNum},'%')
AND cci.REMARK_RENEW LIKE CONCAT('%',#{contractInside.remarkRenew},'%')
AND cci.REMARK LIKE CONCAT('%',#{contractInside.remark},'%')
AND csi.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{contractInside.name},'%')
AND FIND_IN_SET(cci.ID,( SELECT group_concat(cci.ID) AS id FROM cy_contract_inside AS cci JOIN mysql.help_topic AS b ON b.help_topic_id < (length(cci.CONTRACT_PERIOD_DATE) - length(REPLACE(cci.CONTRACT_PERIOD_DATE,',',''))+1) WHERE substring_index(substring_index(substring_index(cci.CONTRACT_PERIOD_DATE,',',b.help_topic_id+1),',',-1),'~',1)>=#{contractInside.contractPeriodFromFrom} AND substring_index(substring_index(substring_index(cci.CONTRACT_PERIOD_DATE,',',b.help_topic_id+1),',',-1),'~',1)<=#{contractInside.contractPeriodFromTo} ))
AND FIND_IN_SET(cci.ID,( SELECT group_concat(cci.ID) AS id FROM cy_contract_inside AS cci JOIN mysql.help_topic AS b ON b.help_topic_id < (length(cci.CONTRACT_PERIOD_DATE) - length(REPLACE(cci.CONTRACT_PERIOD_DATE,',',''))+1) WHERE substring_index(substring_index(substring_index(cci.CONTRACT_PERIOD_DATE,',',b.help_topic_id+1),',',-1),'~',-1)>=#{contractInside.contractPeriodToFrom} AND substring_index(substring_index(substring_index(cci.CONTRACT_PERIOD_DATE,',',b.help_topic_id+1),',',-1),'~',-1)<=#{contractInside.contractPeriodToTo} ))
AND FIND_IN_SET(cci.ID,( SELECT group_concat(cci.ID) AS id FROM cy_contract_inside AS cci JOIN mysql.help_topic AS b ON b.help_topic_id < (length(cci.JOB_AGREEMENT_DATE) - length(REPLACE(cci.JOB_AGREEMENT_DATE,',',''))+1) WHERE substring_index(substring_index(substring_index(cci.JOB_AGREEMENT_DATE,',',b.help_topic_id+1),',',-1),'~',1)>=#{contractInside.jobAgreementFromFrom} AND substring_index(substring_index(substring_index(cci.JOB_AGREEMENT_DATE,',',b.help_topic_id+1),',',-1),'~',1)<=#{contractInside.jobAgreementFromTo} ))
AND FIND_IN_SET(cci.ID,( SELECT group_concat(cci.ID) AS id FROM cy_contract_inside AS cci JOIN mysql.help_topic AS b ON b.help_topic_id < (length(cci.JOB_AGREEMENT_DATE) - length(REPLACE(cci.JOB_AGREEMENT_DATE,',',''))+1) WHERE substring_index(substring_index(substring_index(cci.JOB_AGREEMENT_DATE,',',b.help_topic_id+1),',',-1),'~',-1)>=#{contractInside.jobAgreementToFrom} AND substring_index(substring_index(substring_index(cci.JOB_AGREEMENT_DATE,',',b.help_topic_id+1),',',-1),'~',-1)<=#{contractInside.jobAgreementToTo} ))

SELECT cci.ID, cci.ID_NUM, cci.IS_FIXED_PERIOD, cci.CONTRACT_PERIOD, cci.CONTRACT_PERIOD_DATE, cci.JOB_AGREEMENT, cci.JOB_AGREEMENT_DATE, cci.REMARK_RENEW, cci.REMARK, cci.FILE_NUM, cci.BAD_NUM FROM cy_contract_inside AS cci WHERE cci.ID_NUM=#{idNum}
